text: @Mike_Pence @WhiteHouse You haven't put the American people 1st since the coronavirus started. Y'all administration is doing a horrible job at protecting the American people. Can't wait till y'all MF'ers gone. You so scared of Donald Jacka** Trump, you'd put your own health at risk. Stupid!!!
